subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Marreese Speights converted a go-ahead 3-point play with 1 minutes 10 seconds to play and the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Nets, 82-79, on Wednesday night at the Izod Center in East Rutherford, N.J. The loss extended the Nets’ franchise worst start to 0-8.
